data.text: Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn gumazamizir bar avɨrim uari akuvaghav ikia uari dɨkabɨri. Ezɨ Iesus maghɨra uan suren gumaziba faragha dav gɨa ghaze, “Ia uari bagh gan. Farisiba mati, yis bretɨn aven ghugha a gamizɨma a bar buizɨ moghɨn ian aven mangɨ ia gasɨghasɨgham. Kamaghɨra ifavarir araziba uaghan bar ia gasɨghasigham.
12:2 Matyu 10:26; Mak 4:22; Luk 8:17Moegha itir biziba, da azenim giregham. Akar aven itiba, gumazamiziba dagh fogham.

Ezɨ bizir ia mɨtatemɨn mɨkemeziba, me aruer angazangarimɨn da baragham. Ezɨ bizir tizir ia sighsirir akabar uan kuaribagh arɨgha dɨpenir averiabar uariv kemeziba, me mangɨ dɨpenir nogoribar tuiv dar gun mɨkɨmam.”
Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nan namakaba, kɨ ia mɨgei, ia gumazir namnar kɨnibav sozibar atiatingan markɨ. Me gɨn ua bizitam damighan kogham.
Ezɨ, ia tinarama atiatingam, kɨ ian akagham. Ia Godɨn atiating, a ian namnam gasɨghasighɨva, gɨn ia inigh helɨn avim mɨkɨnamin gavgavim iti. Ezɨ kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, ia Godɨn atiating.
Ia fo, gumazamiziba kuarazir dozir 5pla wan toian vaghvagh dagh ivezegham. Ezɨ God dar tam bakɨnɨghnighan kogham.

12:7 Luk 12:24; 21:18God uaghan ian dapanir arɨziba menge, egha a bar deraghavɨra ia gɨfo. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, ia atiatingan markɨ. Ia kuarazir dozir kabar mɨn itir puvatɨ. Ia Godɨn damazimɨn bar ekevegha dagh afira.”
Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ ia mɨgei, Gumazir manam gumazamizibar damazimɨn ghaze, a nan anam, eghtɨ Gumazamizibar Otarim uaghan Godɨn enselbar damazibar mɨkɨm suam, gumazir kam a nan anam.

12:9 Mak 8:38; Luk 9:26; 2 Timoti 2:12; 1 Jon 2:23Eghtɨ tina gumazamizibar damazimɨn mɨkɨm suam, a nan adarazir mav puvatɨ, eghtɨ kɨ uaghan Godɨn enselbar damazibar mɨkɨm suam, gumazir kam nan anav puvatɨ.

12:10 Matyu 12:31-32; Mak 3:28-29; 1 Jon 5:16Eghtɨ gumazitam akar kuratam Gumazamizibar Otarim mɨkemeghtɨ, God an arazir kurar kam gɨn amadagham. Eghtɨ gumazitam akar kuratam Godɨn Duam mɨkemeghtɨma, God an arazir kurar kam gɨn amadaghan kogham.

12:11-12 Matyu 10:19-20; Mak 13:11; Luk 21:14-15Me ia inigh God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar mangam. Egha gavmanɨn gumazir ekiaba ko gumazir ziaba itibar damazibar mangɨtɨma, ia atiatingan markɨ. Egh suam, kɨ manmaghɨn ua bagh ganam, o manmaghɨn mɨkɨmam?
Dughiar kamra, Godɨn Duam nɨ mɨkemeghtɨma nɨ me mɨkɨmam.”
Ezɨ gumazir mam gumazamizibar torimɨn ikia kamaghɨn Iesus mɨgei, “Tisa, nan aveghbuam mɨkemeghtɨma, a gan afeziam ga bagha taghizir bizitaba na bagh taba tuiragh.”
Ezɨ Iesus a ikaragha ghaze, “Tinara guan osɨmtɨzibar kɨr guan biziba tuiraghasa na mɨsefe?”
12:15 1 Timoti 6:7-10Egha a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia uari bagh ganigh. Biziba bar dagh ifongezir arazir kaba bagh, uari bagh ganigh! Gumazimɨn dabirabim a bizir avɨrir a itir kaba saram otozir puvatɨ.”
Egha an akar isɨn zuir kamɨn me mɨgei, “Gumazir dagɨaba bar avɨrasemezir mam iti. Egha uan nguazimɨn dagher aghuir avɨriba isi.
Egha a kamaghɨn uabɨ gɨnɨghnɨsi, ‘Kɨ manmaghɨn damuam? Kɨ uan daghebar arɨghamin danganiba puvatɨ.’
“Egha a ghaze, ‘Kɨ kamaghɨn damuam. Kɨ uan dagher dɨpeniba kuarighɨva, dɨpenir ekiabara ingarigham. Egh dɨpenir ekiaba, kɨ uan maziaba ko dagheba ko biziba bar dar arɨgham.

12:19 Fofozir Gumazim 11:9; 1 Korin 15:32; Jems 5:5Egh kɨ uabɨra uabɨ mɨkɨmam, “Nɨ dughiar avɨriba bagha ua bagha bizir aghuir avɨrim arɨki. Egh nɨ damɨva, wainɨn dɨpabar amɨva, egh dughiar aghuarim iniva, egh bar akuegh ikiam.” ’
“Ezɨ God a mɨgɨa ghaze, ‘Nɨ gumazir onganim. Dɨmagarir kamra kɨ nɨn ikɨrɨmɨrim inightɨ, nɨ aremegham. Eghtɨ nɨ ua bagha arɨghizir biziba, tina da iniam?’
“Kamaghɨra, tina ua bagh biziba puv dar pozim mɨkɨnɨva, egh a Godɨn damazimɨn onganarazibar amuam, eghtɨ bizir kam a bativam.”

Egha Iesus kamaghɨn uan suren gumazibav gei, “Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ ia mɨgei, ia pamten uan ikɨrɨmɨrim gɨnɨghnɨghɨva, kamaghɨn azangan markɨ, e dagher manatamra damam? Egh ia pamten uan inivafɨzibagh nɨghnɨgh mɨkɨman markɨ, e inir manatam uan mɨkarziba avam?
Gumazimɨn ikɨrɨmɨrim ti daghebagh afira, ezɨ gumazimɨn mɨkarzim ti inibagh afira.

12:24 Jop 38:41; Onger Akaba 147:9; Luk 12:7Ia kuarazibar gan. Da dagheba opari puvatɨgha dagh eghuvir puvatɨ, da dagheba arɨzir dɨpeniba puvatɨ. Ezɨ God dagheba dagh anɨdi! Ezɨ ian ikɨrɨmɨrim bar kuarazibagh afira.
Egh ian tav deraghvɨra ikɨsɨ nɨghnigh, kamaghɨn a ti uan ikɨrɨmɨrim damutɨ a tong ruaragham? Bar puvatɨ.
Nɨ bizir muziarir kam damuan iburagh, nɨ tizim bagha biziba bar a dagh nɨghnɨgha nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh ami?

“Ia akɨmarir aghuaribagh nɨghnɨgh. Da manmaghɨn otifi? Da ingangarir ekiatam gamir puvatɨ. Egha da korotiatam isamizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ kɨ ia mɨgei, fomɨra Atrivim Solomon bizir bar avɨriba ikia an azuir adiariba bar dera, egha an korotiatam akɨmarir kabar mɨn otozir puvatɨ.

E fo, graziba pura biziba, da iti, gurumɨn gumazitam da akoreghɨva da inigh avitam mɨkɨnigham. Grazir kɨnir kaba, God adiariba dagh azui. Ia bizir kam gɨfogh, God uaghan adiariba ia danɨngam. Ia gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavir muziarim itiba!
Ian nɨghnɨzim dagheba ko dɨpabara ikian markɨ. Egh ia pamtem dagh nɨghnɨghan markɨ.
Nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba pamten bizir kabagh nɨghnɨsi. Ezɨ ian Afeziam fo, ia da iniam.
12:31 Matyu 6:33Ezɨ bizir ia bar faragh damuamimra kara: Ia faragh God atɨghtɨ, a ian Atrivimɨn ikɨtɨ, ia an gɨn mangɨtɨ, a bizir kaba ia danɨngam.”
Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia sipsipɨn bɨzir muziarim, ian Afeziam ia damightɨ, ia Atrivimɨn otivasa a bar akonge. Kamaghɨn ia atiatingan markɨ.

12:33 Matyu 19:21; Luk 18:22; Aposel 2:45; 4:34Ia uan biziba amangɨva dagɨaba inigh, egh gumazamizir onganarazibar anɨng. Egh uari bagh dagɨaba azuir mɨtariba inigh dar arightɨma da dɨghoran kogham. Ian bizir aghuir Godɨn Nguibamɨn itiba, da gɨvaghan kogham. Godɨn nguibamɨn okɨmakɨar gumaziba roghɨra izan kogham, eghtɨ barareba dagh asɨghasɨghan kogham.
Nɨn bizir aghuiba itir danganim, nɨn navir averiamɨn itir ifongiam uaghan danganir kamra ikiam.”
Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia ingaramin korotiabar aghuighɨva otivamin bizim bagh ganɨva uan lamba ateghtɨma da isi mamaghɨra ikɨ.

12:36 Mak 13:34-36; 1 Pita 1:13Egh mati gumazim uan gumazir aruamɨn amuir ikɨzir isam bagha ghugha uamategh izasa, me a mɨzuai. Eghtɨ a uamategh izɨ tiam gafughafughtɨ, me zuamɨram a bagh tiam kuigham.

12:37 Jon 13:4Ingarir gumazir kabar gumazir aruam uamategh izɨ men gantɨ, me a mɨzua gari. Kamaghɨn me bar akuegham. Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, a dagheba me danɨngɨsɨ uabɨn kurukegham. Egh me mɨkemeghtɨ, me dakozim dapiaghtɨ a izɨ dagheba me danɨngam.
Egh men gumazir aruam dɨmagarir arɨzim, o amɨnim titɨ a uamategh izɨ men gantɨ me a bagh gan mɨzuam ikɨtɨ, kamaghɨn me bar akuegham.

12:39 1 Tesalonika 5:2; 2 Pita 3:1012:39-40 Matyu 24:43-44Ia arazir kam gɨnɨghnɨgh. Gumazir manam, okɨmakɨar gumaziba dɨmagarimɨn izava an dɨpenim akarasava amima, a men dughiam gɨfogha, men arafa. Egha me ataghizɨ me an dɨpenim akarizir puvatɨ.
12:40 Mak 13:33; 1 Tesalonika 5:6; 2 Pita 3:12Kamaghɨra, ia uaghan aravagh ikɨ gan. Guizbangɨra, dughiar ia Gumazamizibar Otarim mɨzuaman koghamim, a dughiar kamram otogham.”
Ezɨ Pita Iesusɨn azara, “Ekiam, nɨ akar isɨn zuir kamɨn erara mɨgei, o e bar moghɨra?”

Ezɨ Ekiam an akam ikaragha ghaze, “Ingangarir gumazir manamra nɨghnɨzir aghuiba ikia deravɨra uan ingangarim gami? An gumazir ekiam a damutɨ, a ingangarir gumazir igharazibar ganam. Egh dughiar an gumazir ekiam ifongezimɨn, a dagheba isɨ ingangarir gumazibar anɨngam.
Ingangarir gumazir kam ingara itima, an gumazir ekiam iza a batogha an ingangarir kamɨn garima, gumazir kamɨn navir averiam bar an dera.
12:44 Matyu 25:21-23Ezɨ kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, ingangarir gumazir kamɨn gumazir aruam a damightɨma, an an ingangarir gumazir mabar ekiamɨn ikɨva an biziba bar dar ganam.

Egh ingangarir gumazibar dapanim uabɨra uabɨ kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgham, ‘Nan gumazir ekiam zuamɨra izeghan kogham.’ Egh a dɨkavigh ingangarir gumaziba ko ingangarir amizibav soghɨva, damɨva, wainɨn dɨpabar amɨva dapanim onganigham.

Eghtɨ an gumazir ekiam, dughiar an ingangarir gumazim a bagha garir puvatɨzimɨn, an otogham. A dughiar a fozir puvatɨzimɨn uamategham. Eghtɨ an gumazir ekiam bar anerghorarighɨva a inighɨva gumazir God gɨfozir puvatɨziba ko anetɨgham.
“Ingangarir gumazibar dapanim fo, an gumazir ekiam bizir tizim damuasava a mɨkeme, ezɨ an a gamizir puvatɨ. Eghtɨ an gumazir ekiam dughiar avɨribar a ifozoregham.

12:48 Ofa Gami 5:17; 1 Timoti 1:13Eghtɨ ingangarir gumazim an gumazir ekiam ifongezir arazibagh fozir puvatɨghɨva, egh a uabɨ mɨsoghamin arazibar amutɨ, an gumazir ekiam dughiar avɨribar a ifozoreghan kogham. Tina bar bizir avɨriba ini, a ua bizir avɨriba God danɨngam. Ezɨ tina God bizir avɨriba an dafarim garɨki, God uam a dam avɨriba inisɨva an azangsɨgham.”
Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ nguazim avim a darɨghasa izi. Ezɨ avim datɨrɨghɨra isiasa kɨ ifonge.

12:50 Matyu 20:22; 26:38; Mak 10:38-39; Jon 12:27Kɨ tɨghar rurir mam iniam. A mati dɨpam gumazim avarazɨ moghɨn, osɨmtɨziba na bativam. Ezɨ kɨ a inizir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ kɨ bar osemegh mangɨ dughiar kam otogham!
12:51 Matyu 10:34Nɨ ti ghaze, kɨ navir vamɨran arazim inigha, nguazir kamɨn ize? Puvatɨ, kɨ ia mɨgei, kɨ gumazamiziba abɨghasa ize.
Datɨrɨghɨn tugh mangɨ 5plan amuiroghboriba dɨpenir tamɨn ikɨ uari tuiragham, 3pla pumuningɨn apanimɨn ikiam, eghtɨ, pumuning 3plan apanimɨn ikiam.

12:53 Maika 7:6Me uari tuiragham, afeziam uan otarimɨn apanimɨn ikiam, eghtɨ otarim uan afeziamɨn apanimɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ guivim uan amebamɨn apanimɨn ikɨtɨ, amebam uan guivim apanimɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ paba itir amiziba, uan ivozir amebaba ko akabar uari adoghtɨ, otarimɨn amebam uan otarimɨn amuimɨn apanimɨn ikiam.”
Egha Iesus gumazamizir avɨribav gei, “Ia gantɨ, ghuariam aruem magɨramin amadagham anangtɨma, ia zuamɨra suam, ‘Amozim izam,’ eghtɨ a izam.
Egh Sainain amɨnim vangtɨ, ia suam, aruem gan bar puvɨra isiam. Eghtɨ an otogham.
Ia ifavarir gumazamiziba! Ia guizbangɨra, overiamɨn otivir biziba deravɨra dagh fo. Egha ia dughiar kamɨn otivir arazibar gara da abɨzir puvatɨ.”
Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ezɨ ia uari uarir azangsɨghan aghua, bizir tizim a dera.

12:58 Aghuzir Akaba 25:8; Matyu 5:25Egh nɨn apanim nɨ inigh mejistretbar damazimɨn mangɨtɨma, nɨ a ko osɨmtɨzir kam akɨrsɨ tuavimɨn a mɨkɨm ganigh. Puvatɨghtɨma, a nɨ inigh jasɨn damazimɨn mangam. Eghtɨ jas nɨ inigh polisɨn dafarim datɨghtɨ polis nɨ isɨ kalabuziam datɨgham.
Kɨ guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, nɨ azenim giran kogham, egh ikɨ mangɨ nɨ ivezim bar anekɨrighamin dughiamɨn gɨn, azenim giram.”
